amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to subsidize housing assistance for illegal aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide financial assistance in contravention of section 214(d) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1980.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 180 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 180 (Roll no. 320).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Brooks (AL).
